title: Staal Burger - Fanus Rautenbach - From rlsuth.com (site no longe
description:
These are all the Staal Burger episodes from rlsuth.com, before he decided to quit.  Bandwidth?  

Mr. Sutherland, if you&#039;re reading this, could you still send me a cd with all your files on it, or something?  I&#039;ll pay you the 6 bucks or whatever it was.  It&#039;d be great to put them all up here.

It&#039;s a pity I didn&#039;t grab the other OTR stuff he had.

For anyone who doesn&#039;t know Staal Burger: (this is from rsg.co.za)

En ek het destyds The Saint gelees, en ek sÃƒÆ’Ã‚Âª vir haar: ÃƒÂ¢??Ja, so ÃƒÂ¢??n karakterÃƒÂ¢??, en ek verduidelik vir haar wat ek wil hÃƒÆ’Ã‚Âª.

Die program was van 1961 tot 1974 op die lug en is geskryf deur Fanus Rautenbach en Daan Retief. &#039;n Dubbel CD met ses stories word nou deur RP Sales uitgegee. Die CD&#039;s kos R110. Watse dubbel CD met ses stories nonsens is dit die?  Komaan RSG, gee ons al die stories wat julle het, vir &#039;n bietjie minder as R110.  Wel, wat&#039;s R110 deesdae?  Omtrent $20?  In elk geval...

There are 13 episodes in all, and to my knowledge, that is all that has been preserved.  Please correct me if I&#039;m wrong!
